trans-unit.source: Defines an attribute that specifies the scope where a build provider will be applied when a resource is located.
trans-unit.target: 定義屬性，指定在找到資源時將套用組建提供者的位置範圍。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProvider> class will parse and generate code during compilation for a resource with a specific file extension.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProvider>類別將會剖析並具有特定副檔名之資源的編譯期間產生的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProviderAppliesToAttribute> attribute defines the location scope for which the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProvider> object will be called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProviderAppliesToAttribute>屬性定義的位置範圍<xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProvider>將呼叫物件。

trans-unit.source: By setting the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProviderAppliesToAttribute> attribute, you can limit a <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProvider> object to certain reserved ASP.NET directories, such as \App_Code.
trans-unit.target: 藉由設定<xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProviderAppliesToAttribute>屬性，您可以限制<xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProvider>特定保留的 ASP.NET 目錄，例如 \App_Code 的物件。

trans-unit.source: If you do not apply a <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProviderAppliesToAttribute> attribute to a <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProvider> class, the default is <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProviderAppliesTo.All>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不會套用<xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProviderAppliesToAttribute>屬性<xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProvider>類別，預設值是<xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProviderAppliesTo.All>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProviderAppliesToAttribute" /> class that applies to the specified resource location.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProviderAppliesToAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體，並套用至指定的資源位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates where the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProvider" /> class will be applied when a resource with the appropriate extension is found.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示找到適當副檔名的資源時，將套用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProvider" /> 類別之位置。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProviderAppliesTo" /> value that indicates where the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProvider" /> class will be applied when a resource with the appropriate extension is found.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProviderAppliesTo" /> 值，表示找到適當副檔名的資源時，將套用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProvider" /> 類別之位置。
